prompt: A gentle, liquid world where the heuristai logo rises from the surface of a still, glassy pool. The logo appears as a soft, organic shape, glowing lightly with shades of green, its surface rippling as if made from water. Soft waves spread out from the base of the logo, creating a mesmerizing dance of light and shadow across the liquid surface. The air around it shimmers with delicate particles, giving the whole scene a light, dreamlike quality as though the logo is born from the very essence of creative energy.
